cookingInstructions.1: Mix all the cottage cheese with eggs, sugar and mix everything thoroughly.
cookingInstructions.2: Pour flour into the curd and mix thoroughly.
cookingInstructions.3: Place a frying pan over medium heat and pour sunflower oil into it.
cookingInstructions.4: Blind a few small balls from the resulting curd mass and put them on a plate. Then roll the curd balls in flour in turn and put them in the pan.
cookingInstructions.5: Fry the cheesecakes for 1-2 minutes until golden brown. Then turn them over to the other side and also fry until golden.

name: Red Bean Salad with Cream Cheese, Red Onion and Seasonal Lettuce

cookingInstructions.1: Open two cans of red beans in their own juice, drain the juice and rinse the beans with cold water
cookingInstructions.2: Mix the finished beans with finely chopped red onion, herbs, crushed garlic, olive oil, lemon juice and curd cheese.
cookingInstructions.3: Salt, pepper, let the products rub against each other for two minutes and serve.

cookingInstructions.1: Pour a liter of water into a small saucepan and add the washed lentils. Put the saucepan on medium heat.
cookingInstructions.2: Grate a small carrot on a coarse grater, finely chop the onion. As soon as the lentils begin to boil, you need to reduce the heat, and then add another 200 ml of water or broth. Cook for another ten minutes.
cookingInstructions.3: Heat a wide flat frying pan, add sunflower and butter there. Fry onions and carrots.
cookingInstructions.4: Add the fried vegetables to the pan, pour in the cream. Blend the soup with a hand blender until it becomes a thick puree. Soup can be served.

cookingInstructions.1: Cut the vegetables coarsely, tear the salad into pieces.
cookingInstructions.2: Bring heavily salted water to a boil and add the shrimp. After boiling, cook for 5 minutes.
cookingInstructions.3: Clean the shrimp from the shell.
cookingInstructions.5: Sprinkle with sesame seeds and season with mayonnaise.

name: Cottage cheese donuts in powdered sugar

cookingInstructions.1: In a bowl, mix cottage cheese, eggs, flour, sugar, soda and salt until smooth.
cookingInstructions.2: Heat the olive oil well in a small saucepan.
cookingInstructions.3: Using a teaspoon or your hands, roll the dough into balls, each slightly smaller than a walnut.
cookingInstructions.4: Throw donuts into boiling oil and fry over low heat, constantly turning over with a slotted spoon.
cookingInstructions.5: Put the finished donuts on a paper towel and leave for one to two minutes - so that it absorbs excess oil. Serve donuts hot, put on a dish and sprinkle with powdered sugar mixed with vanilla.
